meanings.definition: Make (something) international in character or scope.
meanings.sent1: The company internationalized its operations by expanding to different countries.
meanings.sent2: She internationalized her business to reach customers worldwide.
meanings.sent3: The cat internationalized its territory by exploring the neighboring gardens.
meanings.sent4: His music internationalized the local folk tunes, blending them with global rhythms.
meanings.sent5: The new exhibit internationalized the museum, attracting visitors from around the world.

meanings.definition: Adapt (a product or service) for use in countries other than one's own.
meanings.sent1: The software company internationalized its app to cater to diverse markets.
meanings.sent2: They internationalized the menu to include dishes from various cultures.
meanings.sent3: The robot internationalized its functions to assist users from different backgrounds.
meanings.sent4: Her fashion brand internationalized its designs, incorporating traditional patterns from other countries.
meanings.sent5: The chef internationalized the recipe, adding ingredients popular in international cuisines.
